mapper.sql: ALG_ID, ALG_LNM, ALG_PNM, ALG_TYP_CD, VAR_TYP_CD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID, ALG_CNT
mapper.select:
-- 알고리즘 목록 조회 SELECT
FROM WAA_ALG WHERE 1=1
AND ALG_TYP_CD = #{algTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (ALG_LNM LIKE #{algLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR ALG_PNM LIKE UPPER(#{algLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
mapper.insert:
insert into WAA_ALG
ALG_ID,
ALG_LNM,
ALG_PNM,
ALG_TYP_CD,
VAR_TYP_CD,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
WRIT_DTM,
WRIT_USER_ID,
ALG_CNT,
#{algId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{algLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{algPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{algTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{varTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{algCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update WAA_ALG
ALG_LNM = #{algLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALG_PNM = #{algPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALG_TYP_CD = #{algTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VAR_TYP_CD = #{varTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALG_CNT = #{algCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ALG_ID = #{algId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAA_ALG set ALG_LNM = #{algLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALG_PNM = #{algPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALG_TYP_CD = #{algTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VAR_TYP_CD = #{varTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = IFNULL(OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = now(), WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALG_CNT = #{algCnt, jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ALG_ID = #{algId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
